Horovitz, Joseph, in Grove Music Online (2001) He was born in Vienna, Austria and moved to the United Kingdom in 1938. His works include 16 ballets. The children's "pop cantata" Captain Noah and His Floating Zoo (1970) was his best known work.Captain Noah and his Floating Zoo, Wise Music He was also a professor at the Royal College of Music in London. Horovitz died on 9 February 2022, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Austrian Jews Category:British composers Category:British conductors Category:Academics of the Royal College of Music Category:Writers from London Category:Musicians from London
